.. index:: TranscendentalFunctionCategory

.. _l5472616e7363656e64656e74616c46756e6374696f6e43617465676f7279:

TranscendentalFunctionCategory
==============================

:viewcode:`trigcat.spad line 116 <trigcat.spad#L116>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <trigcat.spad#L116>`


Category for the transcendental elementary functions.
